body_html:
@tatatodd actually yesterday I tried to implement this feature, and than I found that I do agree with you that TensorFlow-side wrapper for this feature would be kind of redundant.

We can always load the model proto with protobuf lib only nicely. So just feel free to close this, thanks.

body:
@tatatodd actually yesterday I tried to implement this feature, and than I found that I do agree with you that TensorFlow-side wrapper for this feature would be kind of redundant.

We can always load the model proto with protobuf lib only nicely. So just feel free to close this, thanks.
